languages.text: "Ей пора уйти к Неумирающему. Бей не в горло — в сердце. Вижу, что на нем лежит тяжелый груз, который надо сбросить, а устам — прошептать последнюю молитву".
"It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."
languages.original_text: "Ей пора уйти к Неумирающему. Бей не в горло — в сердце. Вижу, что на нем лежит тяжелый груз, который надо сбросить, а устам — прошептать последнюю молитву".

"It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."

languages.text: «Es hora de que se reúna con el Inmortal. No ataque su garganta, sino su corazón, que es donde lleva una pesada carga. Que sea libre de ella y que sus labios recen por última vez».
languages.original_text: "It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."

traits.locale_text: «Es hora de que se reúna con el Inmortal. No ataque su garganta, sino su corazón, que es donde lleva una pesada carga. Que sea libre de ella y que sus labios recen por última vez».

languages.text: 「彼女が不死の者に送られる時が来たのです。彼女の喉は残しますが、代わりに心臓を貫きます。そこには重い重荷がありますので。その重荷を捨てさせ、その唇に最後の祈りを捧げさせるのです」
languages.original_text: "It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女が不死の者に送られる時が来たのです。彼女の喉は残しますが、代わりに心臓を貫きます。そこには重い重荷がありますので。その重荷を捨てさせ、その唇に最後の祈りを捧げさせるのです」

languages.text: “是时候送她去见不死之神了。为她的喉咙带来解脱，刺穿她的心脏吧，因为她的心里承受着沉重的负担。是时候让她卸下这样的重担，让她的嘴唇最后一次祈祷了。”
languages.original_text: "It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."

traits.locale_text: “是时候送她去见不死之神了。为她的喉咙带来解脱，刺穿她的心脏吧，因为她的心里承受着沉重的负担。是时候让她卸下这样的重担，让她的嘴唇最后一次祈祷了。”

languages.text: "Es war Zeit, sie zum Todlosen zu schicken. Verschont ihre Kehle, trefft stattdessen ihr Herz, denn dort trägt sie eine schwere Bürde. Lasst sie diese Bürde ablegen und ihre Lippen das letzte Gebet sprechen."
languages.original_text: "It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."

traits.locale_text: "Es war Zeit, sie zum Todlosen zu schicken. Verschont ihre Kehle, trefft stattdessen ihr Herz, denn dort trägt sie eine schwere Bürde. Lasst sie diese Bürde ablegen und ihre Lippen das letzte Gebet sprechen."

languages.text: « L'heure est venue pour elle de rejoindre l'Immortel. Épargnez sa gorge, et frappez plutôt son cœur, car c'est là que réside son plus lourd fardeau. Libérez-l'en pendant que ses lèvres murmurent une dernière prière. »
languages.original_text: "It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."

traits.locale_text: « L'heure est venue pour elle de rejoindre l'Immortel. Épargnez sa gorge, et frappez plutôt son cœur, car c'est là que réside son plus lourd fardeau. Libérez-l'en pendant que ses lèvres murmurent une dernière prière. »

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'e gönderilmesinin vakti geldi. Silahını boğazına değil de kalbine sapla. Zira o ağır yükü taşıdığı yer kalbi. Bu yükten kurtulmasına ve dudaklarından son bir dua dökülmesin müsaade et."
languages.original_text: "It is time she was sent to the Undying One. Spare her throat, but strike her heart instead, for that is where she carries a heavy burden. Let her shed this burden, and let her lips pray their last."
